{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Billion |model=BiPAC 7800VDPX |revision= |upc=4719170003587 |ean= |asin= |price=240 |est_release_date=07/2012 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6361 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=512 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2=16 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM6361 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=wlan-ap-2.4g,wlan-ap-5g |default_ssid_regex=^wlan-ap-2.4g$,,,^wlan-ap-5g$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:04:ED |oui_eth=00:04:ED }} ''Dual-band Wireless-N VoIP ADSL2+ Router''
[http://au.billion.com/product/voip/bipac7800vdpx.php Product page (AUS)]
[http://au.billion.com/downloads/BiPAC_7800VDP(O)X_FM%202.23.rc2_UM_1%2023.pdf Manual] [http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/1972671 On the whirlpool.net.au forums] (specs, review) :BCM6361 SoC, 16MB Flash, 512MB NAND Flash, 2Gb RAM The manual specifies three login credentials for the device.. *'''Administrator:''' admin/admin *'''Local:''' user/user *'''Remote:''' support/support Default settings are per the manual. The 00:04:ED OUI is assumed.. but it is the only OUI with observed '''wlan-ap-2.4g''' SSIDs in WiGLE (there were no hits for '''wlan-ap-5g''', though). ==Images== Image:7800VDPX-ok02.jpg|angled Image:7800VDPX-ok01.jpg|front [[Has images::external| ]]
